item.description:
TC: Andrea anissenbaum@lycos.com or (617) 469-9599 until 9:00pm

EVENT: A fun time for all, play a round of golf at McGolfâ€™s mingolf and get a chance to test your skills out with some other Mosaic members at one of the best courses in the area. McGolf is also noted for having some great ice cream that people can enjoy after playing a round or 2.
Bring bug spray and rain cancels.
Meet : Meet 4:00pm at McGolf Rte 109 Dedham in the parking lot near the entrance.
RSVP: Requested. Phone calls or messages to Andrea until Sept 19th.
COST: $7.25 for golf plus $5.00 for non-members. Ice cream or dinner after the game.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the rear parking lot at 4pm and contact the TC for the details

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: MINATURE GOLF
